title: Jeremy Corbyn – 2014 Comments on Military Base in Bahrain
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jeremy Corbyn, the Labour MP for Islington North, on 7 December 2014.
content:
Absolutely shocking! Britain to establish first permanent Middle Eastern military base for 43 years in Bahrain.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
